StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Humanoid_Name
StringTable.String: Humanoid

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Humanoid_Desc
StringTable.String: Species that shares a similar physical form with Humans, typically characterized by an upright bipedal stance, two arms, and a head with sensory organs.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Reptilian_Name
StringTable.String: Reptilian

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Reptilian_Desc
StringTable.String: Reptilians are cold-blooded and scaled. They prefer warmer climates and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_DesertWorld]Desert[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Cybernetic_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Cybernetic_Desc
StringTable.String: Artificial species have extensively integrated technology into their biology, enhancing or altering their capabilities. Artificial species do not require [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] and do not have any natural [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS], they must be constructed on planets using the [HS=HS_ManufactureLife]Manufacture Population[/HS] project.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Synthetic]Synthetic[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Avian_Name
StringTable.String: Avian

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Avian_Desc
StringTable.String: Avians are characterized by bird-like features, including feathers, wings, and beaks. They prefer environments where they can perch and build at various elevations and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_ArborealWorld]Arboreal[/HS] or [HS=HS_JungleWorld]Jungle[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Aquatic_Name
StringTable.String: Mer

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Aquatic_Desc
StringTable.String: Mer phenotypes are adapted to live in water environments. They will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_AquaticWorld]Oceanic[/HS] World. On all other Worlds, they will have lower [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_Aquatic]Aquatic[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Insectoid_Name
StringTable.String: Insectoid

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Insectoid_Desc
StringTable.String: Insectoid races resemble terrestrial insects, featuring exoskeletons, multiple limbs, and compound eyes. They tend to live in homogenous collectives that increase their [HS=HS_Resistance]Resistence[/HS]. They also prefer lively, oxygen-rich environments and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_JungleWorld]Jungle[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Fungal_Name
StringTable.String: Fungal

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Fungal_Desc
StringTable.String: Fungal species have a symbiotic relationship with their environment and reproduce via spores. They are naturally drawn to environments rich in plant diversity; the more humid, the better, and they will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_JungleWorld]Jungle[/HS] World. They will also get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when Specialized as [HS=HS_Farmer]Farmers[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Crystalline_Name
StringTable.String: Crystalline

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Crystalline_Desc
StringTable.String: Crystalline species are composed of mineral-like structures. As a Silicon-Based Phenotype, Crystalline species do not rely on [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] and natural [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS]. Instead, they utilize [HS=HS_Promethion]Promethion[/HS]. Having more [HS=HS_Promethion]Promethion[/HS] in storage will increase the populations' [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SiliconBased]Silicon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Gaseous_Name
StringTable.String: Gaseous

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Gaseous_Desc
StringTable.String: Gaseous species are sentient clouds of gas, difficult for other phenotypes to communicate with, and more difficult to harm. They prefer environments that most other lifeforms would struggle to survive in and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_ToxicWorld]Toxic[/HS] World. As an Ammonia-Based Phenotype, Gaseous species do not rely on [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS]. Instead, they feed on [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] which aids in population [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] and boosts [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_AmmoniaBased]Ammonia Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_SiliconBased_Name
StringTable.String: Onyxine

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_SiliconBased_Desc
StringTable.String: Onyxine species use silicon as the backbone of their biological structure. They thrive in extreme environments that would typically degrade organic matter. They do not rely on [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] and natural [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS]. Instead, they utilize [HS=HS_Promethion]Promethion[/HS]. Having more [HS=HS_Promethion]Promethion[/HS] in storage will increase the populations' [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SiliconBased]Silicon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Plantoid_Name
StringTable.String: Plantoid

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Plantoid_Desc
StringTable.String: Plantoid species resemble plants with roots, leaves, and photosynthetic capabilities. They are most at home in temperate environments full of life, and they will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on an [HS=HS_ArborealWorld]Arboreal[/HS] World. They will also get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when Specialized as [HS=HS_Farmer]Farmers[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Mammalian_Desc
StringTable.String: Mammalian species are warm-blooded and bear live young.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Mammalian_Name
StringTable.String: Mammalian

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Arachnoid_Name
StringTable.String: Arachnoid

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Arachnoid_Desc
StringTable.String: Arachnoid species are spider-like, with multiple eyes and limbs. As natural hunters and killers, Arachnoid species have increased [HS=HS_Soldiering]Soldier Ability[/HS]. They excel in complex environments where prey and places to hide are plentiful and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_JungleWorld]Jungle[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Radiotrophic_Name
StringTable.String: Radiotrophic

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Radiotrophic_Desc
StringTable.String: Radiotrophic species derive their energy from radiation, similar to how plants use sunlight. They thrive in radioactive environments and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_RadioactiveWorld]Radioactive[/HS] World. As an Ammonia-Based Phenotype, Radiotrophic species do not rely on [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS]. Instead, they feed on [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] which aids in population [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] and boosts [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_AmmoniaBased]Ammonia Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Molluscoid_Name
StringTable.String: Molluscoid

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Molluscoid_Desc
StringTable.String: Resembling mollusks, these species might have soft bodies, hard shells, and tentacles. Molluscoid species are highly adaptable, excelling in aquatic or terrestrial environments, and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_TerrestrialWorld]Terrestrial[/HS] or [HS=HS_AquaticWorld]Oceanic[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Amphibian_Name
StringTable.String: Amphibian

StringTable.Label: Phenotype_Amphibian_Desc
StringTable.String: Resembling frogs and salamanders, these species have multi-staged lives. Amphibians are comfortable when they can live on both land and in the water and will get an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost when on a [HS=HS_JungleWorld]Jungle[/HS] or [HS=HS_TropicalWorld]Tropical[/HS] World.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CarbonBased]Aquatic Based[/HS] [HS=HS_Biology]Biology[/HS].
